content: the backpack bronto is the perfectly-sized amigurumi dinosaur for hanging on a child s backpack it works up quickly and can be easily customized to be made in your child s favourite colour or in a colour to match their backpack included in the pdf version of this pattern is the materials list and added notes to turn the backpack bronto into a cuddle-sized toy so no matter where your little one goes they can have a dino friend with them the pdf also includes photo tutorial support **printable ad-free pdf versions of the pattern are available in my ravelry shop or** **here** https //theloopylamb etsy com/ca/listing/1074382951/dinosaur-crochet-pattern-crochet-pattern **in my etsy shop the ad-free pdf version of the pattern includes the material list added notes on how to make the giant brontosaurus and photo tutorial support that the free version does not have ** **skill level ** easy **language ** english **terminology ** u s terminology **sizes ** backpack bronto approximately 5 tall not including caribiner clip giant bronto approximately 13 5 tall **follow me on social media to see behind the scenes of new upcoming designs and giveaways ** **instagram ** www
